DryadDataFile.dcterms:title: 28S_alignment
DryadDataFile.dcterms:description: Alignment of 169 partial 28S rDNA nucleotide sequences from amphipods in genus Niphargus. Sequences were highly variable in their length and were aligned in MAFFT ver. 6 using the E-INS-i option for sequences with multiple conserved domains and long gaps.
DryadDataFile.dcterms:subject: amphipods
biodiversity metrics
community
conservation biology
groundwater
